extendedInfo.description: Can you KnockDown? Yes, ofcourse you can! Or should we say: yes we can..... knock the can!The most addictive and 100% FREE game on Android Market and become an expert Can Knocker while aiming at and knocking down piles and pyramids of 3D Cans! Start playing and you just won't put down this marvelous title till you drain your battery empty!Multiple levels are added, multiple scenes for more joy and addiction.Important notice:If you see the game lagging, please continue playing. It should get smoother as you replay the same level again. this free version is ads supported, thanks for your support.If you like this game, please rate it!Disclaimer:This free version is ads supported, it may contain push notification ads in the tray and/or home screen icon ads. thanks for your support.check out our other apps: surah yaseen, ar rahman, ramadhan calendar 2013, sahih al bukhari hadith, asma ul husna, turbo bike race, sniper attack, videos player, thanks
